name: Strike Force Cassie Cage
synergy: Strike Force Characters do 10% more Damage vs. Ronin Characters.

name: Day of the Dead Erron Black
synergy: Opponent Assassin Characters have dodge chance reduced by 10%.

name: MK11 Frost
synergy: MK11 teammates gain a 25% chance to apply Freeze on Combo Enders. Triborgs and Spec Ops teammates gain 15% speed and 25% Crit chance boost. All characters in Frost's team deal 20% more damage with Ice attacks.

name: MK11 Fujin
synergy: All MK11 and Elder God teammates have a 50% chance to apply Dispel after any SP.

name: Onslaught Fujin
synergy: After Elder God teammate's Combo enders, Onslaught Fujin has a 30% chance to assist with a crossbow and shoot the opponent while tagged-out, dealing damage. Onslaught teammates have a 50% chance to resist Power Drain, including Onslaught Fujin.

name: MK1 Geras
synergy: All team members have a 30% chance to reflect any negative effect back to an opponent. All MK1 team members get Power for 5 sec. after tag-in.

name: Nightmare Ghostface
synergy: Before a teammate receives fatal damage, Billy rushes in to save them by attacking the opponent. This ability triggers maximum 1 time per match and 1 more per each Nightmare in the team.

name: American Treasure Homelander
synergy: Parental Figure gains 15% Speed Boost, 25% Power Generation Boost and 50% Debuff Resistance.

name: Assassin Jade
synergy: Assassins do 10% more damage versus Circle of Shadow.

name: Day of the Dead Jade
synergy: Opponent Assassin Characters have dodge chance reduced by 10%.

name: Klassic Jade
synergy: Klassic teammates are immune to Snare.

name: Lizard Jade
synergy: Lizard teammates have a 30% chance to reflect any debuff.

name: CoS Jax Briggs
synergy: Circle of Shadow Characters do 10% more damage versus Strike Force Characters.

name: Onslaught Jax Briggs
synergy: If Jax tags-out, his Heat will decrease over time (1 stack per second), but not if the Heat is fully accumulated. For each additional Onslaught and Spec Ops teammate, Jax's Heal amount is increased by 5%. When a teammate is healed by Heat Release, they instantly gain 1 bar of power. When a teammate is healed by Heat Release, they instantly gain 1 bar of power

name: Klassic Movie Johnny Cage
synergy: Johnny gets a little faster with each Klassic Movie teammate. Spec Ops teammates have a 10/20/50% chance to resist Blind.

name: Strike Force Johnny Cage
synergy: Strike Force Characters do 10% more Damage vs. Ronin Characters.

name: Klassic Kabal
synergy: Each Poison applied on an opponent grants Kabal team +15% damage to combo enders for the rest of the match, up to +75%. Klassic teammates heal while under the effect of Adrenaline.

name: MK1 Kenshi
synergy: All Johnny Cage, Kung Lao, Raiden, Kenshi on the team are immune to Blind, including Kenshi MK1. MK1 teammates get a 10-20% reduced Power cost on all Special Attacks.

name: Ronin Kenshi
synergy: Ronin Characters do 10% more Damage vs. Kold War Characters.

name: Assassin Kitana
synergy: Assassins do 10% more Damage versus Circle of Shadow.

name: CoS Kitana
synergy: Circle of Shadow Characters do 10% more Damage versus Strike Force Characters.

name: Day of the Dead Kitana
synergy: Opponent Assassin Characters have dodge chance reduced by 10%.

name: Edenian Blood Kitana
synergy: For each Jade, Sindel and Rain character in Edenian Blood Kitana's team, the Whirlwind reduces incoming damage by additional 5%

name: MK2 Movie Kitana
synergy: A teammate with the highest Attack gains 35% of all power drained by Kitana. Kitana's team ignores the opponents's Power Drain resistance and reflect. Immunities are not affected.

name: Ronin Kitana
synergy: Ronin Characters do 10% more Damage vs. Kold War Characters.

name: CoS Kung Lao
synergy: Circle of Shadow Characters do 10% more Damage versus Strike Force Characters.

name: Cos Liu Kang
synergy: Circle of Shadow Characters do 10% more Damage versus Strike Force Characters.

name: Fire God Liu Kang
synergy: Elder God teammates have 25% Basic attacks unblockable chance, and their Special Attacks have a 20-50% chance of being assisted by Liu Kang's fireball that applies Fire DOT.

name: MK1 Mileena
synergy: Outworld team members, including MK1 Mileena, get 30% resistance to Stun and take 5% less damage for each stack of Disease on the active opponent. MK1 teammates increase and restore 10% of their maximum health upon and opponent's death.

name: CoS Nightwolf
synergy: Circle of Shadow Characters do 10% more Damage versus Strike Force Characters.

name: Klassic Nightwolf
synergy: Klassic teammates including Nightwolf deal 15% more damage with Fire and Lightning Attacks, and have a 20% all Special Attacks unblockable chance.

name: MK11 Nightwolf
synergy: MK11 teammates get bonuses according to Nightwolf's animal combat stance (even when Nightwolf is defeated): Wolf: 10-30% Damage boost,Bear: 20-40% Max Health boost, Eagle: 10-20% Power Gen boost

name: Darkest Knight Noob Saibot
synergy: Noob Saibot and teammates cannot be hit by opponents tag attacks. When a Netherrealm teammate receives fatal damage, the Minion is sacrificed, saving the teammate (once per match). Gains 1 additional Minion Sacrifice for each Netherrealm teammate.

name: Klassic Noob Saibot
synergy: Klassic characters including Noob Saibot receive a 30% damage boost to all unblockable attacks.

name: MK11 Noob Saibot
synergy: +50% Critical and Lethal Damage for Netherrealm teammates.

name: CoS Quan Chi
synergy: Circle of Shadow Characters do 10% more Damage versus Strike Force Characters.

name: Klassic Movie Raiden
synergy: Defenders of the Earth Realm, winners of the tournament and their brave descendants receive +50% Basic Attack damage boost, and those who defeated the evil sorcerer Shang Tsung and saved the Earth Realm receive +10% Power generation.

name: MK11 Raiden
synergy: MK11 teammates are immune to power drain.

name: Edenian Blood Rain
synergy: Rain assists his Outworld teammates with a lightning striker on their combo enders. For each Edenian Blood teammate, Low Tide's cooldown is reduced by 1 second.

name: Klassic Rain
synergy: Klassic teammates start with 1 Bar of Power.

name: MK11 Rain
synergy: All MK11 and Raiden teammates have 400% Recovery (even when Rain is defeated).

name: Kold War Scorpion
synergy: Kold War characters do 10% more damage versus Day of the Dead Characters.

name: MK1 Scorpion
synergy: MK1 Scorpion gains more Fire Vitality energy on Basic Attacks for each Martial Artist teammate.

name: Strike Force Scorpion
synergy: Strike Force Characters do 10% more Damage vs. Ronin Characters.

name: Klassic Shang Tsung
synergy: Shang Tsung's scroll assists Klassic characters on Special Attack 1 with an energy beam that deals 20% of Shang Tsung's attack and heals and active teammate for the damage dealt.

name: MK11 Shang Tsung
synergy: Active MK11 teammates heal for 15-35% of their maximum health after defeating an opponent.

name: Edenian Blood Sindel
synergy: Outworld characters on Sindel's team are immune to Slow.

name: MK11 Sindel
synergy: MK11 and Netherrealm teammates have 25% unblockable attacks chance and 25% chance to resist Stun.

name: Assassin Skarlet
synergy: Assassins do 10% more Damage versus Circle of Shadow.

name: Klassic Skarlet
synergy: Characters in Skarlet's team get a 20% Basic attacks unblockable chance boost. For each Klassic teammate, the chance increases by 10%.

name: Kold War Skarlet
synergy: Kold War characters do 10% more damage versus Day of the Dead Characters.

name: Klassic Smoke
synergy: Klassic Teammates gain 20% resistance to all debuffs.

name: MK1 Smoke
synergy: During Ninjutsu, MK1 Smoke and his teammates' attacks become Sneak Attacks and their Combo Ender chance becomes 100%. MK1 team members, including MK1 Smoke, gain 30-50% chance to apply Weaken before the opponent's Special Attack.

name: Klassic Movie Sonya Blade
synergy: While Sonya Blade Klassic Movie is alive, Raiden teammate applies Blind on Special Attack 1. If Sonya Blade Klassic Movie is teamed with any Johnny Cage, and he is alive, then she gains Shield after performing Leg Takedown Hit with Amplify.

name: Kold War Sonya Blade
synergy: Kold War characters do 10% more damage versus Day of the Dead Characters.

name: Tormented Soul Spawn
synergy: Each team member (including Spawn) receives a 5-15% Max Health boost from each bar of currently accumulated Necroplasm.

name: CoS Sub-Zero
synergy: Circle of Shadow Characters do 10% more Damage versus Strike Force Characters.

name: Kold War Sub-Zero
synergy: Kold War characters do 10% more damage versus Day of the Dead Characters.

name: Onslaught Sub-Zero
synergy: Sub-Zero can save any of his Onslaught teammates from death once by encasing them in a Cryoshell.

name: Ronin Takeda
synergy: Ronin Characters do 10% more Damage vs. Kold War Characters.

name: Dark Fate Terminator
synergy: Spec Ops teammates take 5-15% less damage.

name: Ace of Knaves The Joker
synergy: Each time his teammate dies, Joker gets excited and restores 10-25% of his max HP.

name: Black Dragon Tremor
synergy: All Black Dragon teammates gain 30-50% damage boost against enemies affected by stun, cripple, and weaken.
